reviews.text:
We ate here last Sunday night. It was a really good this time.

The wine pours are excellent. I got the chicken parm, my wife got fettuccine and meatball....

I wanted to love this spot so badly, and upon arrival I thought we would!

Made reservations and were seated quickly. Got wine to share, ordered calamari....
My friends had some gift cards they wanted to use and we said, "Let's go to Marcella's!" I have never been before so it was a welcomed treat! This location...
